title: SamplingDescription
description: Information about the sampling process, used during the experiment. In some experiments no sampling is taking place at all, for example, if an experiment is monitored via a photospectrometer in a 96-well plate over time.

gas_phase.title: gas_phase
gas_phase.description: Information about the composition of the gas phase above the reaction solution, including gases such as nitrogen, carbon dioxide, argon, oxygen or other gases.

mixing_during_sampling.title: mixing_during_sampling
mixing_during_sampling.description: Provide information about whether the reaction was mixed during sampling, as this can affect the representativeness of the collected sample.

time.title: time
time.description: The time at which the sample was taken.

vessel_opened_for_sampling.title: vessel_opened_for_sampling
vessel_opened_for_sampling.description: Information about whether the reaction vessel was opened for sampling or not.

volume_per_sample_unit.title: volume_per_sample_unit
volume_per_sample_unit.description: Common units include mL (milliliters), Î¼l (microliters), g (grams), or other volume units, depending on whether the samples are liquid or solid.
